colors.theme_strategy: Dark Mode Only (Industrial Context). High contrast text (Zinc-100) on dark backgrounds.

visual_enhancers.surface_description: Visible 1px borders (zinc-800) on all containers. No soft shadows. Technical markers.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Used sparingly for overlays only. bg-zinc-950/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10.
visual_enhancers.borders: Sharp or minimal radius (rounded-sm). 1px solid border-zinc-800.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.decorations: Technical crosshairs (+) at grid intersections. Dashed lines for grouping related data.

grids.dashboard: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-px bg-zinc-800 border border-zinc-800

cards.style: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-zinc-800 rounded-sm p-6 relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-zinc-950 border-zinc-800 focus:border-orange-500 rounded-sm font-mono text-sm

badges.style: border border-current bg-transparent rounded-sm px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider

login_background.description: Dark warehouse with forklift - use with heavy overlay for Login Page background

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}
motion.micro_interactions: Active states should glow. Buttons should have a subtle 'press' effect (scale-95).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text is Zinc-300 or lighter on dark backgrounds. Avoid dark grey text.
accessibility.aria: Use aria-label for all icon-only buttons.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'Manrope' and 'IBM Plex Sans' fonts immediately.
2. THEME: Force Dark Mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle. This is an industrial tool.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room' grid strategy. Dense data, minimal whitespace between cards, but generous padding INSIDE cards.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove rounded corners (set radius to 0.25rem or 0).
5. KANBAN: Use 'dnd-kit' for the drag-and-drop board. Columns: New, In Progress, Repaired, Scrap.
6. CALENDAR: Use FullCalendar with a custom dark theme (override CSS to match Zinc-900).
7. DASHBOARD: Create a 'Bento Grid' layout for the main dashboard. Use Recharts for analytics (Bar chart for requests by team, Pie chart for status).
8. FORMS: Use 'react-hook-form' + 'zod'. Split the Equipment form into logical sections (Basic Info, Location, Warranty).
9. NAVIGATION: Sidebar navigation (Left) with icon-only mode on collapse. Use Lucide-React icons.
10. AUTH: Implement a custom JWT flow. Login page should use the 'Dark warehouse' image as a background with a glassmorphism card.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ü§ñüß†üí≠üí°üîÆüéØüìöüé≠üé¨üé™üéâüéäüéÅüéÄüéÇüç∞üéàüé®üé∞üí∞üíµüí≥üè¶üíéü™ôüí∏ü§ëüìäüìàüìâüíπüî¢üèÜü•á etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
